p: Antirhea borbonica J.F Gmelin ( A. borbonica) powder (leaves) was obtained from APLAMEDOM institute (Association pour les plantes aromatiques et médicinales de La Réunion) and registered under the following code, DéTROI.002/2018, stating the date of collection and the GPS coordinates (21°05′44.9″ S, 55°39′06.6″ E), altitude: 770 m. The pharmacist and director of APLAMEDOM performed the botanical identification of A. borbonica. The dried (air-dried protected from direct light) leaves were reduced to powder using a laboratory grinder. The crushed leaves of A. borbonica were conserved at −20 °C.
